post_body: A friend got 3 correct picks and still got a silver coin. Has anyone else had this happen? Is it a bug or are we reading the requirements wrong?
comments: You get points for placing pickems, can get silver with 0 correct picks

You are guaranteed to get silver if you activate your pass before the time runs out and just save pickems, any pickems really for the first two stages.

3 points for silver, 1 from pass, 1 from placing picks and saving in opening stage and 1 from placing picks and saving in elimination stage.
This generation truly can't read instructions
